#summary Terminal program used to develop and debug PropForth

http://ttssh2.sourceforge.jp/

Versions of teraterm used in testing:
4.67
4.65
4.63

Install using all defaults

Change the following parameters: 

  Setup - > Terminal -> New-Line receive CR+LF (PropForth 3.6 and later should use default CR)

  Setup - > Terminal -> New-Line Transmit CR 

  Setup - > Terminal -> Terminal ID VT100

 Setup - > Terminal -> Local Echo UNCHECKED

 Setup - > Terminal -> Auto Switch Checked 

 Setup - > Terminal -> Answer back - blank 

 Setup - > Serial Port Setup  -> Port COMx (what ever PropTool says when it finds your prop)

 Setup - > Serial Port Setup  -> Baud Rate 57600

 Setup - > Serial Port Setup  -> Data - 8 BIT

 Setup - > Serial Port Setup  -> PArity - none 

 Setup - > Serial Port Setup  -> Stop - 1 bit

 Setup - > Serial Port Setup  -> Flow Control -none 

 Setup - > Serial Port Setup  -> Transmit Dely -> 0 msec/char

 Setup - > Serial Port Setup  -> Transmit Dely -> 0 msec/line 

 Setup - > Serial Port Setup  -> Transmit Dely -> 

 Setup - > Serial Port Setup  -> Transmit Dely ->
